Package com.mobius.vdrapi.exceptions

Class Summary
 

Exception Summary
AccessDeniedException This exception is thrown if a security violation occurs.
AddressErrorException This exception is thrown if an invalid address is passed to the API
ArchiveNotOpenException This exception is thrown when an archive being accessed should be open, but is not.
AsyncRequestInProgressException This exception is thrown when the current operation cannot be completed because an asynchronous request is in progress.
AuthenticationException This exception is thrown if an error occurs when authenticating to a document server.
CallbackException This class is the root of all exceptions which are specific to callbacks.
CommandNotLoadedException This exception is thrown if a command object is executed before it has been loaded.
CommandTypeNotFoundException This exception is thrown if a command type cannot be found that matches a string.
CustomizationException This exception is thrown if a customization error occurs.
DataAlreadyExistsException This exception is thrown if a piece of data already exists, for example, in response to trying to create or modify a piece of data.
DataInvalidException This exception is thrown if a piece of data is not valid for the current operation.
DataIOException This exception is thrown if an object cannot read or write a piece of data - for example, in response to trying to create or modify a piece of data.
DataNotFoundException This exception is thrown if the data an object is searching for cannot be found.
EndOfListException This exception is thrown if the end of the search list has been reached but there is more data to be returned.
EndOfScopeException This exception is thrown if the end of the search scope has been reached before finding a match.
ExternalErrorException This exception is thrown if a problem is detected by the external subsystem
FactoryTypeNotSupportedException This exception is thrown when an ISession object does not support a particular SessionFactoryType.
FeatureNotSupportedException This exception is thrown if a specific product feature is not supported.
FileNotArchiveException This exception is thrown when a file being accessed is not recognized as an archive file.
InsufficientMemoryException This exception is thrown if there is insufficient memory
InternalLogicException This exception is thrown as the result of an internal logic error.
InvalidCallbackException This exception is thrown if a callback was installed, but for some reason cannot be used.
KeyInvalidException This exception is thrown if a string value is not a valid key.
KeyMissingException This exception is thrown if a particular key was not found.
MissingCallbackException This exception is thrown if a class expects a callback object to be installed, but it isn't.
MissingRenderStreamException This exception is thrown if the output stream to be used for rendering is null or invalid.
MultipleCallbacksSetException This exception is thrown if a class expects to find either one of two possible callback objects set, but finds that the caller has set both callbacks.
OperatorNotSupportedException This exception is thrown if a VdrSearchTerm contains a ComparisonOperator that is not supported by the query.
PageLockedException This exception is thrown if the page cannot be locked because it's already locked by another process.
PageNotLockedException This exception is thrown if the page cannot be unlocked because it's not currently locked.
PageNotRenderedException The PageNotRenderedException class and its subclasses are exceptions that indicate that the current page has not been rendered.
ParameterException This exception is thrown if an invalid parameter list is presented.
ParsingException The class ParsingException and its subclasses are exceptions that indicate that a problem arose when attempting to parse something.
PartialDataException This exception is thrown if only part of the data was returned.
PromptNotAllowedException Some classes need to call other objects to prompt the user for values; these objects may throw this exception if they do not allow prompting.
PropagatedException This exception is thrown when another exception occurs that the class cannot throw.
RenderFormatNotSupportedException This exception is thrown if the page cannot be converted to the render format that was requested.
ResourceUnavailableException This exception is thrown if the resource is busy.
SearchLimitExceededException This exception is thrown when a stop count limit exceded warning W185I is gerenated by the server.
SessionNotOpenException This exception is thrown if a session needs to be open for a function to work, but is not open.
SessionPoolException Exception handler for Session Pool objects.
SystemErrorException This exception is thrown when an unrecoverable error occurs within the native code of a Java class.
TimeoutException This exception is thrown if the request timed out.
TopicItemLimitException This exception is thrown if the topic item limit was reached
UserAbortException This exception is thrown to indicate that a user aborted the current operation.
UserExitException This exception is thrown if an error was returned by the user exit.
ValueInvalidException This exception is thrown if a key value is not valid.
ValueMissingException This exception is thrown if an expected value is missing.
VersionMismatchException This exception is thrown if a version mismatch occurred.
ViewDirectException The class ViewDirectException and its subclasses are exceptions that indicate a problem with a ViewDirect API function.
